A simple example

Wrap both your image and your html map in an angular-maphilight directive: 

<angular-maphilight id="MapTitle">
  <img src="src/images/shapes.png" width="500" height="300"/>
  <map>
    <area shape="rect" title="Rectangle" coords="60,109,277,179" />
    <area shape="circle" title="Circle" coords="377,144,47" />
  </map>
</angular-maphilight>
